Articles.Content:
Hi all,

I recently added Extraplantary launch pads, USI Kolonisation (MKS/OKS) and now the resource map in the resource map overlay mod has vanished!

I'm sure one of these mods wants me to do a proper scan to find my ore/karbonite/water etc, but I've no idea how and I've no idea that I haven't broken something.

Can anyone advise? Map resource overlay was available before installing these two extra mods.
Do you have the latest versions of MapResourceOverlay and SCANsat?
I believe I do. How can I check their versions?

Doesn't map resource overlay come with scansat bundled?

- - - Updated - - -

Ok so I installed Scansat separately and the latest version of map resource overlay and all is good again! YAY thanks!

I believe I do. How can I check their versions?

Sounds like you already got it sorted, but for completeness - open up the big map and it should say in the top left.
